EmailTemplate.name: 202006_Americas_GDT_Sell-More_free-6-month-subscription_Email.Internal email
EmailTemplate.subject: Zero upfront costs to sell your parts to 3,000+ aerospace companies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It is time.
E-Commerce is everywhere and it’s only a matter of time before almost all aerospace parts sales are transacted online. For a limited only, we are offering a FREE 6-month seller subscription.
GoDirect Trade takes the hassle out of selling and makes it simple and easy to start selling online:
- Launch a storefront in three easy steps (~5 minutes to complete). Your free 6-month subscription does not require a credit card. - Watch your customer base grow and the orders come in.
GoDirect Trade is the aerospace marketplace of the future. It has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company/#3e7c44d768e9]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor.”
Zero upfront costs to start selling online today. LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/bWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
